com.atakmap.android.toolbar

Class ButtonTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.toolbar.Tool
      • com.atakmap.android.toolbar.ButtonTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnKeyListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BloodHoundTool, BullseyeTool, CircleEditTool, DrawingEllipseCreationTool, DrawingEllipseEditTool, EditablePolylineEditTool, IntentLauncherTool, LaserBasketDisplayTool, PlaceHostileTool, RangeAndBearingTool, RectangleEditTool, SensorFOVTool, VehicleRotationTool

    public abstract class ButtonTool
extends Tool
    Handles button selected state, enabled state, and sends begin_tool/end_tool intents when you press the button.

        Description copied from class: Tool

        onToolBegin in class Tool

        extras - extra params that were passed by the GUI

      • initButton

        protected void initButton()
        Performs button initialization, setting up onclick listeners etc. Overide if the default behavior (start tool if it isn't started, stop if if it is) isn't sufficient.

      • setActive

        protected void setActive(boolean active)
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Called to set whether a tool is actively being used. Generally, this should be automatically handled by the onToolBegin(), onToolEnd() life cycle. Override to update GUI elements to reflect the new value.
        Overrides:
        setActive in class Tool
